messages.title: my plan for the Shipley constituency

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Philip has been a constant supporter of the police and is pleased the Government announced an extra 20,000 police officers.
The Shipley constituency is getting an unfair deal from Bradford Council. Philip has launched a campaign to break away from Bradford Council.
The constituency voted to leave and Philip continues to work hard to ensure the vote is delivered.
Philip has secured a feasibility study and an intention from the Government to pay for the bypass.
Schools getting the most generous boost in funding is in part tribute to Philip's hard work, according to the Schools Minister.
Philip believes prisoners should serve their sentences in full.

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority – or a hung parliament.

quotes.text: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority
